communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Louisiana Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

A copy of all complaints filed against Safety National From January 1st 2022 until the processing of this request.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Matthew Fecteau

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

The complete Public Entity Excess Retained Limits Liability Insurance Policy, number  XPR4068320, issued by Safety National Casualty Corporation to Washoe County. Please provide all versions of this policy in effect from January 1, 2022, to the date this request is fulfilled.

Any and all documents, correspondence, or notices of denial of claims submitted under the aforementioned policy (XPR4068320) from January 1, 2022, to the date this request is fulfilled.

Any and all documents, correspondence, or notices of partial denial of claims submitted under the aforementioned policy (XPR4068320) from January 1, 2022, to the date this request is fulfilled.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Matthew Fecteau

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

A copy of Safety National Policy GL 6676132 and CA 6676131, and any disclaimers or partial disclaimers sent out to the city from January 1st 2024 until the processing of this request.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Matthew Fecteau

title: Safety National Casualty Corporation / Sedgwick Claims Management Services Regulatory Action

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Safety National Casualty Corporation / Sedgwick Claims Management Services Regulatory Action
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

A copy of the following complaints and results if resolved.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Matthew Fecteau

communications.subject: 25-FO-0791 RE: [External] Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Safety National Casualty Corporation / Sedgwick Claims Management Services Regulatory Action
communications.communication:
Good afternoon, Mr. Fecteau,

The Department is in receipt of the FOIA request below.  As we work to process your request,
would you please answer the following:


  *   Are you a complainant, respondent, or do you represent one of these entities in a complaint filed with the Department?  If so, please include your role and the complaint number with your response.

We ask that you respond to this email by July 18, 2025.

Sincerely,

Renee


[DOI seal]<http://insurance.illinois.gov/>Renee Overton
Illinois Department of Insurance
Freedom of Information Act Officer
O: 217.557.9248
C: 217.986.0106
320 W. Washington
Springfield, IL  62701
